===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}}. In this character [[尸]] represents a man, and [[匕]] (otherwise meaning "spoon") also represents a man; two men leaning against each other, originally meaning "close, intimate". The derivative [[昵]] refers to the original word.
